definition: The term "Antike" refers to the historical period that encompasses the ancient civilizations of Greece and Rome, as well as other ancient cultures. It is commonly used to describe the time period, artifacts, architecture, literature, and philosophy from this era.

examples.german: Die Antike war eine Epoche in der Geschichte.
examples.english: The antiquity was an epoch in history.

examples.german: In der Antike wurden viele bedeutende Bauwerke errichtet.
examples.english: Many significant buildings were constructed in antiquity.

examples.german: Die Antike beeinflusste die Entwicklung der europäischen Kultur.
examples.english: Antiquity influenced the development of European culture.

examples.german: In der Antike gab es verschiedene Hochkulturen wie die Griechen und Römer.
examples.english: In antiquity, there were various high cultures such as the Greeks and Romans.

examples.german: Die Kunst der Antike ist bis heute von großer Bedeutung.
examples.english: The art of antiquity is of great importance to this day.
